control_attributes.Control: SI-6 (2) AUTOMATION SUPPORT FOR DISTRIBUTED TESTING
control_attributes.control_description: The information system implements automated mechanisms to support the management of distributed security testing.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs integrity verification tools to detect unauthorized changes to [Assignment: organization-defined software, firmware, and information].

Control Statement: The information system implements automated mechanisms to support the management of distributed security testing.
